name: Lord Vader
overview: Using your light saber, board the rebel scum ship and make your way past insolent droids and consular guards and crush the rebellion! Block shots with your sword, pick up dark side energy boosts and take out your former master. Then follow the rebels to Hoth base and drive them off planet. Follow them to Cloud City and put the scoundrel in ice. Finally fight the Emperor for your son, if you dare!
